channel.title: Customs and Help
channel.description: 1.How Do i Add Customs Likes Vesta, Spirit Shields, Statius, Morrigons, Zuriel? 2. i been having lately problems with crasher and spammer.. does anyone have an anti-spam or something that will remove spammers! maybe how many people log in from one ip address! but if it requires coding i need a coder. i tried eariler and i didn't succeed! 3.how can i add a donator cape to my server with emote and certain bonus?
